code: import React,{useState,useEffect,useContext}from"react";import{Route,Redirect,Routes,useNavigate,useLocation}from'react-router-dom';import{SidebarContext}from"./context/SidebarContext.js";import Sidebar from"./pages/app/Sidebar";import Navbar from'./pages/nav/Navbar.js';import AnimatedRoutes from"./pages/nav/AnimatedRoutes.js";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const App=()=>{const[sidebarState,dispatch]=useContext(SidebarContext);const changeDash=type=>{dispatch({type});};let navigate=useNavigate();const{pathname}=useLocation();const settingsDashPages=['/settings','/settings/user','/settings/receipts'];const walletDashPages=['/wallet','/shared','returns'];useEffect(()=>{if(walletDashPages.includes(pathname)){dispatch({type:'SHOW_BAR'});dispatch({type:'WALLET_BAR'});}else if(settingsDashPages.includes(pathname)){dispatch({type:'SHOW_BAR'});dispatch({type:'SETTINGS_BAR'});}else if(pathname==='/'){navigate('/wallet');}else{dispatch({type:'HIDE_BAR'});}},[pathname]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"App",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"app-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"nav",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Navbar,{})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"dashboard",children:sidebarState.visible&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Sidebar,{})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:sidebarState.visible?"app-content-dashboard":"app-content",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(AnimatedRoutes,{})})]})});};export default App;
